trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> objects.

A GridViewColumnCollection object contains a set of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> objects that are typically used to define the columns of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> object.
A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A> that defines the layout of data in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control.

To receive notification of changes in the collection, monitor the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged> event that is inherited from <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>.
Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"></xref> class.
Removes all of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> objects from the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"></xref>.
Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> to the collection at the specified index.
This method creates a new item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection> without replacing another item.
To replace an item in the collection with a new item, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection.SetItem%2A> method.
The position to place the new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> to insert.
Changes the position of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> in the collection.
The original position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref>.
The new position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref>.
Raises the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged> event when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"></xref> changes.
The event arguments.
Removes a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
The position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> to remove.
Replaces the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> that is at the specified index with another <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref>.
This method replaces a column in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection> with a new column.
To insert a new column without replacing another column, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection.InsertItem%2A> method.
The position at which the new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> replaces the old <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> to place at the specified position.
